text: is a Japanese politician. He has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2003. He has also been the Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries since 2024 in the Cabinet of Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba. He was in this role before from 2019 to 2020 during the Shinzo Abe government. His father was controversial former government minister, Takami Eto."Japanese ex- minister found dead in Vietnam hotel room" - AFP - Nov 22, 2007 - Accessed Dec 1, 2014 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
